website_summaries.verdict: These bars help you breathe new life – tasty, smoky-flavored life – into your Weber grill.
pros: Set of five porcelain-enameled flavorizer bars
Fits a wide variety of Weber grills
Helps give flavor to food and protect burner bars
Extends the life of your Weber grill
cons: They do not fit all Weber grills, so check carefully to see if they will work with yours

customer_reviews.title: Excellent replacement for Spirit 310 grill with knobs located on the side.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement to freshen up a trusty grill that lasted 5 years with original parts. I have a Weber Spirit 310 that is black with stainless side pieces. The knobs to my grill are located on the SIDE and it is from approximately 2010.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: Old grill + new bars = classic BBQ taste
customer_reviews.text: My Weber Genesis Silver B won't let me buy a new grill. It just won't die on me. Thank goodness! Over time (now on my 14th year), I've needed to replace the simple things - grates, flavor bars and even, just recently, the ignition kit. These flavorizer bar replacements are great. They fit perfectly and continue to reflect the same durability of all the Weber-made products. I immediately christened them with a porterhouse steak and a rack of St. Louis ribs. I look forward to many more years of grilling pleasure dripping flavorful fat and sauces on these bars to keep my BBQ recipes tasty!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey DanielsTop Contributor: BBQ Styles

customer_reviews.title: Great replacements!
customer_reviews.text: These are great replacement, true to the stated dimensions. These brought my old grill back to life by redistributing the flames from the burners evenly and leveling the cooking surface temp.(meaning: my fronts burn low, middle medium, and back burners high. The old ones were so decayed it was like cooking over an open fire with no flame control.) They hold up as well!(lily behind in writing my reviews)
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Weber quality
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfectly in my older Genesis Silver Weber grill. The old set was rusting badly and it was time to replace them. These fit perfectly and look great. The proof will be in the cooking and I will test them out in a few days. The price was reasonable for original manufacturer replacement flavorizer bars. I’m happy as of now.
customer_reviews.author: Carlisle, PA

customer_reviews.title: Not Worthy Of The Weber Name
customer_reviews.text: I'm not the carnivore I once was so the originals that came with the grill lasted almost 10 years. On the replacements, out of the box the enamel is flaking off the metal. I'll be returning these. There doesn't seem to be a quality alternative available. I will try to find them in my local store where I can examine the contents first to make sure the enamel is not coming off already. These are very poorly made. Not what I've come to expect from Weber. Disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: bottomless_barrel

customer_reviews.title: Just what my steaks needed!
customer_reviews.text: These are factory replacement flavor bars for many Weber grills. They simply popped in place after removing the old ratty ones that were nearly 20 years old and were full of holes. Immediately it seems the grill now heats much hotter and far more evenly, and the steaks come out perfect! To replace the old ones took about two minutes tops. You might want to clean the grill's sides beneath the cast iron grill plates while you have everything out.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Arenberg

customer_reviews.title: Weber - Flavorizer Bars Replacement Success
customer_reviews.text: It's nice to replace the old rusty Weber Flavorizer Bars on our Weber 310 gas grill! The old bars were rusty and chipping away at the edges allowing too much flame to come through. The new replacement bars fit perfectly. Using Amazon Prime with free delivery made the process easy. Included: photos of the old bars & the new bars installed
customer_reviews.author: VICKI L BACON

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for my weber
customer_reviews.text: I bought a old Weber Genesis grill that needed new flavorizor bars. Ordered these and cleaned the old grates along with the inside of the fire box. She's got alot of life left in her and working great now! These bars were a perfect fit. No problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Travis H

customer_reviews.title: Extended Lifespan of my Weber Grill
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat pricey but can significantly extend the lifespan of your grill. My Weber grill is quite old but most parts are still in great shape, the only thing that rusts and disintegrates over time is these flavorizer bars. With all the grease and other drippings falling on them (and me never cleaning them), they slowly wear away. These bars were a perfect fit. I looked up my grill part number and verified the lengths I would need, then found these and they fit perfectly. Now my grill can last several more years!
customer_reviews.author: Frank Meeuwissen

customer_reviews.title: Factory replacements
customer_reviews.text: perfect fit for my grill. The originals were rusting out after 9 years of being outside year round in upstate NY. We grill even in the middle of winter so the grill takes some abuse. I was at the point of replacing or repairing. The prices of the new grill "guided" my decision to repair my existing Weber grill. I hope we can get another 9 years out of it now.
customer_reviews.author: D D.

customer_reviews.title: Worth-while Investment to Restore Weber Grill
customer_reviews.text: Along with new grill plates, I replaced the flavorizer-bars on my Weber Genesis Silver grill after six years of regular service, as they were literally falling apart. By making this investment of about $40 (along with $80 for the grill plates), I have a virtually new Weber grill that is cooking as evenly as it ever did. Well-worth the price to enjoy grilling food well again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah A. Daley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent replacement Weber flavor bars - Weber Silver b
customer_reviews.text: These only take a few minutes to install and are well worth the $$ to replace. My originals were totally rusted out and ready for replacement. There are many others on the market you can get at a lower price, however I am not sure of the longevity. I would not hesitate to get these since the last set lasted around 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: Maximus Decimus Meridius

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered Weber this time and what a difference in the quality. I have had a Weber grill for about 15 years and with the Weber replacement parts available, I probably won;'t ever have to buy a new grill. Their parts are far better than other brands. I learned my lesson and from now on I will only purchase from Weber. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: MM L

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit.  Working Great!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as replacements because ours were completely rusted through after five years. They fit perfectly in our Weber. They arrived quickly, were well packaged and in perfect condition. It took about 60 seconds to install them. We have had them for a few weeks and they are working perfectly. We barque a lot, at least three times a week. They still look clean. We paid full price for these and were not compensated in anyway for this review.
customer_reviews.author: Sean B. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Grill Made “New” again
customer_reviews.text: I was going to buy a new grill, yet couldn’t justify the $800+ cost. Decided to update my well used parts for approx $100. Replaced my Genesis Silver B (2005) “Flavorizer” bars & burners with genuine Weber parts, after thoroughly cleaning grill. Looks/Works better than new, due to updated burner design.
customer_reviews.author: Clark Griswald

customer_reviews.title: Old grill cooks like brand new!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you have any doubts, yes! These are very important! My had rusted out several years ago, and i was about to throw out my trusty grill and buy a new one. Just on a hunch i was scrolling through Amazon, and came across them. I bought them just to see if they made a difference, the old grill works better than new!!! Night recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Perry

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy grilling again
customer_reviews.text: I have a 12 to 15 year old Weber Genesis Silver. The enamel burner covers were shredded and burned from years of use and heat distribution and flare up were terrible. I almost bought a new grill, but everything else with the grill was fine. I bought these and installed and it's like i got a new grill! Heat distribution back to normal, reduced flare up and love grilling again!
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with your Weber model
customer_reviews.text: After 7 years of pretty heavy grill use, the old Flavorizer bars were rusting and needed replacement. The new ones are performing as expected. In researching online retailers, I discovered how many slightly different Flavorizer sizes there are for the many Weber models. To avoid returning the wrong size, make sure you order the bars that fit your model. In a different matter, despite Amazon's push to reduce excess packaging, the outer (Amazon) box they shipped was about 4 or 5 times the size of the inner (Weber) box. No filler padding, so the inner box just slammed around in the huge outer box. Keep trying, Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Steven V. Owen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Replaced these after over 10 years on the old set. These are well made and fit perfectly. Haven't fired up the grill yet but after cleaning etc. it looks brand new. All other components are original. This thing is built like a tank.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: you need them
customer_reviews.text: my second set they will last for years I use the grill at least 4 times a week I think the original set with the grill lasted longer but I did not use to grill as much as I do now they protect your burners too
customer_reviews.author: BAO89

customer_reviews.title: Fits Perfect
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricy I guess but honestlyWeber makes the best grills and these flavor bars are no exception. The last set lasted me at least 5 years. I grill a lot, all year round. Fit my 300 series Spirit Grill.
customer_reviews.author: Steve K.

customer_reviews.title: This is the second set of flavor bars I have ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set of flavor bars I have purchased for my 18 year old Weber Genesis Silver C grill. They fit/work as described.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy choice if yours need replacement
customer_reviews.text: My experience is that these get caked in basically non-removable baked grease ash at roughly the same rate that they start to corrode, and they aren't a food-touching surface anyhow, so there is no reason to spring for the more expensive stainless steel ones offered. Be careful handling them, I gave myself a pretty nasty cut when a piece of the porcelain coating cracked off and jabbed me as I was putting it on. Once every five years or so, replace these to keep the grill making tasty flavor and delivering even heat. There is something so rewarding about a Weber - that you buy for life - and refurbish to like-new performance every so many years. Great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Fish

customer_reviews.title: Don't fall for cheap stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: This is the original part, made right. Cheap modern grills have low grade stainless all over them, and it doesn't last the way good stainless -or this procelain part does.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Bart

customer_reviews.title: My Old Silver has new life...again.
customer_reviews.text: Fits and works great...I’ve been through this a few times over the years. Seems like my Weber can go forever just by replacing these and a few other components about every 5 seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Sammaman

customer_reviews.title: All Weber products are excellent
customer_reviews.text: Weber makes an excellent product at a compariable price with what's on the market. After much use the flavor bars burn out after 3 to 4 years and need to be replaced. I see alot of barbecues at the recycle center some older some newer but you never see a weber in the junk.
customer_reviews.author: Bigman49

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for my Weber Genesis Silver C
customer_reviews.text: The new flavorizer bars are making a world of difference on my old grill. I also bought a new set of stainless-steel burner tubes and new cast iron 7526 cooking grates. The grill did not have cast iron originally. These flavorizer bars also fit Genesis 3000. The old flavorizer bars were still good and not rusted through-just very old. I started off just replacing the crossover bar that rusted through and ended up replacing all the burner tubes and the other parts mentioned. I'm glad I did. It made me very happy to keep my old grill (which cooks like new now) and for the cost of a new Weber I've saved a ton of $$ by doing so :).
customer_reviews.author: glow

customer_reviews.title: these are the OEM product
customer_reviews.text: genuine Weber part. I've had my Weber gas grill for over 17 years. Periodically replace these flvorizer bars and grill grates--also genuine Weber. Proper parts are important; grill functions wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: purchaser in El Segundo Calif

customer_reviews.title: Genuine Weber factory part.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this part "used". Actually, only the box was very slightly damaged. The flavorizer bars themselves were in perfectly new condition. Felt good about saving a few bucks going with the "used" version.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Cooking with gas, now that's hot.
customer_reviews.text: I have had a Weber Silver (B) for 14 years and the flavorer bars wore through... holes, rust, etc. Lots of use. These new bars fit perfectly and when used for the first time I actually feel that I was able to get a higher and more even heat with lower heat levels, probably because there were no holes or weak areas. Need to get the grill replacements some time soon and I'll be back to Amazon for those as well. Love that you can get manufacture's replacement products for such great prices.
customer_reviews.author: LAM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for Weber Spirit 300
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat one day shipping, just received these and they fit perfect, came in sturdy box which was packed in an Amazon Box. Old grill look like new, well the bars do!
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Grill is like new again
customer_reviews.text: Time to get your grill working like new again. Simple start is replacing your old parts. These fit perfect my weber and back to grilling like new.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Mine lasted less than 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Here I sit, looking to order another new set of flavor bars. Bought these exact ones 2 years ago, they are falling apart. Not the same as the originals.
customer_reviews.author: S.Beans

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: Fast Shipping, great item, refurbished gas grill with as many original parts as possible, still working great after 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: These fit just like factory. I didn't realize how bad mine were until I replaced them. Great price and shipped fast.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Poor choice on my part
customer_reviews.text: My grill is always covered when not in use and after one season they are rusting out Very disappointed I would not recommend purchasing these
customer_reviews.author: rand

customer_reviews.title: These are the real deal.
customer_reviews.text: These are the real deal. I just returned a non Weber set cause they simply were not the quality of the Weber brand.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.  Works well
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Pay a little more, get a better product. Weber products are worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Fit our Weber model C perfectly. Will update durability and quality it's necessary. They are Weber's and last forever.
customer_reviews.author: ccrider

customer_reviews.title: Great product (perfect)
customer_reviews.text: These are 100% perfect , just as described , came in official WEBER box and fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Monte699

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my replacement purchase of the Weber 7536 Porcelain-Enameled Flavorizer Bars. They appear to be very well constructed. I only hope they last as long as the originals.
customer_reviews.author: Tzuma

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Been a year now and even though I keep my grill covered it still have a few rust spots on the flavor bars . Doesn't seem to harm the function of the grill at all I just hoped they'd last a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan h

customer_reviews.title: Spruced up my Weber
customer_reviews.text: Adding these plus some additional elbow grease helped make my 14 year old Weber look great again,
customer_reviews.author: C Gray

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement parts
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the flavorizer bars, grates and burner tubes to replace old, worn out parts onour Webergrill. I found the exact parts I needed through Amazon's Warehouse Deal department at a great savings. There was nothing wrong with the parts and I assume someone justorderedthe wrong parts and returned these. By switching out these, I basically haves newgrillwhich I expect won't have to be replaced for many years. (The last made it eight years.). I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: randee

customer_reviews.title: Fits my weber Grill
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Weber Grill. This is not stainkess steel so I don't know how long this will last
customer_reviews.author: AQS

customer_reviews.title: I needed this
customer_reviews.text: After taking a close look at my grill this spring, I needed new flavorizer bars and this item did the trick very well
customer_reviews.author: Hawaiian Eye

customer_reviews.title: Weber Spirit Flavorizer Bars
customer_reviews.text: Living on the ocean, we go through gas grills every 3 years or so. This time we bought a Weber "Spirit" Gas grill and it is now two years old. The original Flavorizer bars completly rusted out, so decided to replace and extend the life of the grill. Note, there appears to be two sizes of Weber "Spirit" grills. I purchased the 20' 1/2" flavorizer bars at Home Depot and they were too short. Home Depot does not carry the 21' 1/2" bars and I was able to find them on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Brynn Allen

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly in Weber Spirt 310 (side controls)
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in Weber Spirt 310 (side controls) circa 2009-ish. They look so bight and shiny!
customer_reviews.author: R. Demers

customer_reviews.title: Fixed the uneven heating problem
customer_reviews.text: Our grill was not heating evenly on each side, so I order these Bars along with the Steel Burner Tube set. Both the tubes and these Bars were showing a lot rust. The shipping was quick and the Bars were shipped in a sturdy packaging since these are very heavy. Installs very easy and after adjusting the Burner Tubes the grill heats much faster and much hotter. Worth the investment and saved the grill from the junk yard.
customer_reviews.author: David Mortaz

customer_reviews.title: Bbq
customer_reviews.text: Should have bought these years ago. They fit perfectly as replacement in the Weber genesis grill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Working Like New
customer_reviews.text: My original burners lasted over a decade, but it was time to replace them. These burners are authentic Weber and were easy to install. My grill is now working like new.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Replaced 10 year old bars, also replaced burners. Grill is like new again.
customer_reviews.author: J. C. S. I

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: My old bars were totally useless. These installed quickly and now my grill is better than ever.
customer_reviews.author: Grampy

customer_reviews.title: Sooooooo.... Easy!
customer_reviews.text: Ordering these bars and putting them in the BBQ was a snap! I've never done something like this before because I haven't had too. With no male around I was forced to try and found the description dove-tailed to the model number and there were no screws or any moving parts. I'm in! Worked like a charm!!! All the more reason to not buy off-brand stuff. This way parts are easy to find and install.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara L. DeHaven

customer_reviews.title: Correct part
customer_reviews.text: Exactly the correct part. Continued availability of parts keeps our trusty Weber grill performing well. The original part lasted 8+ years! Weber is the way to go!!
customer_reviews.author: Jose Nova

customer_reviews.title: Weber Flavorizer Bars
customer_reviews.text: My grill is a weber 900. The grill is thirteen years old so we needed new flavorizer bars. My hubby installed them. We have our old grill back everything taste's so good these barrs really make a 100 percent difference in taste. I like my old weber 900 grill much better than the charcoal, the food dries out so bad with the charcoal. Now I can use my old grill another thirteen years. Shipping was fast we also got new burners along with our bars Everything is working GREAT!!!!! THANKS AMAZON
customer_reviews.author: D. Cederquist

customer_reviews.title: Fit not as specified, can't use
customer_reviews.text: We very carefully checked the specs with the size and brand and model of our grill, but it is too large and unusable. We wasted our money.
customer_reviews.author: Diane B.

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Measured old ones twice and got these, perfect fit. I'd purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: sh68137

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Used to replace in a Weber grill. Holding up well and doing what they're supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Quarts

customer_reviews.title: Genuine OEM
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 10+ year old Genesis Silver. OEM part in a Weber box. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kendall89

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement for my Weber Silver B
customer_reviews.text: My last Bars finally gave out this past month. One of them basically broke in two from rusting through. These new bars fit perfectly and I'm back in business. Since these are designed to basically create the smoke (and therefore most of the barbecue flavor) from falling grease and juices from the meat, they are an important part of the grill. Shouldn't have waited this long to replace them. If yours are rusting through, do yourself a favor and replace yours.
customer_reviews.author: S Myers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement part
customer_reviews.text: These were the exact replacement part for my Weber grill Spirit model. The grill was purchased in 2009 and has the 3 side mounted burner controls. The bars were the perfect fit and exactly like the ones that came with the grill when it was new. Looking forward to many more years from my Weber now that its brand new inside again.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Harding

customer_reviews.title: P effect replacement
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit remove old and place these in their place
customer_reviews.author: hoover

customer_reviews.title: Buy the original
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy the cheap stuff. They are thin and well rust through in no time.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Do it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm leaving the same review I posted for the replacement burners. I wish I would have bought this years sooner. My grill is something like 12 years old, and in great shape except for the heat consistency. There were hot spots that changed location from time to time, and lots of flare ups despite cleaning. I purchased a new burner kit and flavor bars, and the grill works like new. Couldn't be happier! Highly recommended. Go to the Weber web page if you have any questions about which kit will fit your Weber grill.
customer_reviews.author: SVincze

customer_reviews.title: LOVING MY GRILL
customer_reviews.text: Got the grill at an Estate sale very reasonable. Needed new flavorizer bars and now its just like it was new
customer_reviews.author: Todd Bankord

customer_reviews.title: As good as the original
customer_reviews.text: The flavor bars were 1/2 inch too long for my grill. However, I was able to cut them to the correct size. They work fine.
customer_reviews.author: J. Potts

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I had the original set that came with my Weber back in 2005. I finally replaced the disintegrating Bars the end of last August. The new bars are already rusting into the base metal. I guess it was my fault in assuming they would be constructed of the same quality as the original bars which came with my grill. If I would have known this, I would have purchased the stainless steel bars. The only reason I didn't was because the original bars had lasted so long.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy and Lena McGinnis

customer_reviews.title: Even grilling again!
customer_reviews.text: Great value & easy installation. Makes our grill like new again with no "hotspots"
customer_reviews.author: Sam Spin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Heavy-duty and nearly identical to the original. Very happy with these
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Fits my Weber grill
customer_reviews.text: I’ve not used my barbecue grill yet, but the bars fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Doodee138

customer_reviews.title: Porcelain works best.
customer_reviews.text: I have had my grill for way over 20 years and have had to replace the bars only twice. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: DEM

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Weber quality at a price I couldn’t find at any store! These are the first things to replace as its closest to the heat and hold food. Quick shipment. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey dematto

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: The flavor bars replaced some very well-used ones on my old, but still very useful BBQ.
customer_reviews.author: Eric A.

customer_reviews.title: Great item, great price
customer_reviews.text: Pulled the rusted out tents, and these slid right in: working perfectly. Great item, great price!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffry L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Weber flavorizer bars
customer_reviews.text: Picked up these flavorizer bars for my weber genesis. The size and length were perfect replacements. I would recommend taking a measurement prior to ordering since there are multiple genesis models. I've also read other reviews that stainless Steel replacements are better although they are more expensive. I don't have any complaints about the porcelain flavorizer bars.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: fits my old weber genesis
customer_reviews.text: At 22.5" long, this fits my old Weber Genesis grill which I got on craigslist and the flavorizer bars were already rusty with 1 missing, hence the replacement set. Nothing much else to add except that I should've measured the old ones first before ordering what I thought was a perfect fit just because the description says that it fits a Weber "Genesis" grill. Also should've gotten these sooner. Can't go wrong with a genuine Weber part at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: orliec

customer_reviews.title: We love our Weber grill
customer_reviews.text: These Flavorizer Bars help prevent flareups in your grill. Mine were all rusty as they were several seasons old. Simply remove the old ones, drop these in their place, and you're done. Takes less than 5 minutes. Understand that these are considered to be consumable goods when it comes to your grill and should be replaced every few years.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. ThenTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: These work great, just not forever
customer_reviews.text: They probably last 6 years or so as I am on my 3rd set. I love my grill and these work great!!
customer_reviews.author: Chad H.

customer_reviews.title: Better price than locally found
customer_reviews.text: Never realized how corroded and rusted out my old ones were until this spring when I opened up the grill to clean it out, and one or two of the old ones crumbed and fell apart!! These fit in very nicely into my old Weber and muchmuch cheaper than buying locally from some hardware or bigbox stores. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: boxeralley

customer_reviews.title: Fits spirit 310 with side gas control
customer_reviews.text: Replaced 10 year old bars on a spirit 310 with gas controls on the side. Fit perfectly and heat distribution is like new. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Patone

customer_reviews.title: They will start to look like rusting hulks after only the first few times but ...
customer_reviews.text: These are meant to literally be "in the line of fire" so they take a beating and do their job well. They will start to look like rusting hulks after only the first few times but as long as they are not rotting with holes in them they do not have to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: need to change once in a while
customer_reviews.text: these get very f'ed up after a year of use. They become rusted, turn orange with burn marks, so you have to change probably about every 2-3 years. Hate paying for it but better than your grill catching on fire. This is main reason it does; if these arent brushed/scraped per 6 months, flame up is virtually guaranteed. Then they get really old, after a couple years wise to toss em and replace.
customer_reviews.author: ggzola

customer_reviews.title: Direct replacement for Weber grill; easy install
customer_reviews.text: Direct replacement for original bars that had rusted through. Toss the old ones and drop in these replacements. Hardest part is getting the grease off from lifting up the grill grates to put these in. First world problems.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly fit Weber Genesis Silver B grill
customer_reviews.text: These flavorizer bars perfectly fit my 16-year old Weber Genesis Silver B grill. Quality probably exceeds original bars
customer_reviews.author: Larry Logger

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I Always Buy Named Brand Products And That Products Replacement Parts. Shipping And Fit To My Grill Was Perfect.....BUSTER
customer_reviews.author: BUSTER

customer_reviews.title: New Grill or new Bars?
customer_reviews.text: My new hobby is to find replacement parts for things we own that need replacing or repair and then adding the job to my husband's 'Honey Do' list! :) All in an effort to save money. These were priced well (I guess....better than buying a new grill), and they perfectly replaced the broken, rusty, chipped ones that I was trying to cook a decent steak over. They were very easy to replace and work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Supermom

customer_reviews.title: Chips in the enamel from the factory
customer_reviews.text: These come chipped from the factory. I returned a set just to open the next and see just as many chips. I'm sure they will rust sooner than the original's as they have sections that are already bare metal. I gave up and installed the chipped set.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than a new grill
customer_reviews.text: Made my side control Weber spirit grill just like new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's been about a year and a half and I don't see any signs of rust the grill is outside all year around in the north east are u
customer_reviews.text: Product is holding up well. It's been about a year and a half and I don't see any signs of rust the grill is outside all year around in the north east are use it twice a month in the winter and a lot more in the summer considering the flame comes in direct contact with them they're holding up and I'm happy when the time comes I would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: YOURE PAYNG FOR THE NAME WEBER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: They work as described, but I think you pay a lot more just for the name Weber. When these wear out (the last ones wore out in three seasons), I will buy from somewhere else because I think for the price I paid for them before, was way too high for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: IMHO

customer_reviews.title: fit our grill perfectly
customer_reviews.text: These were easy to install and are providing us with more years with our Weber grill.
customer_reviews.author: subscribe and save patron

customer_reviews.title: Makes the grill like new
customer_reviews.text: We got this when expected. It is just what my husband needed to replace the old bars. Now it is like a new grill without such an expense. The food tastes great!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia C

customer_reviews.title: OK but had to replace
customer_reviews.text: My original flavor bars I think rusted much too early. Weber should provide longer lasting bars with initial purchase. I them ordered what I believed to be the correct replacement but when they came they were 1/4 inch too long? I had to return and replace. The replacements fit just right; I hope they last a little longer than my other sets. I don't use this second weber that much so I expected better.
customer_reviews.author: Nikado3

customer_reviews.title: quality Weber parts, replacement straightforward.
customer_reviews.text: replaced the burners and flavorizer bars after 14 years of frequent use. The burners are well made, as are the flavorizer bars. Since these replacement parts carry the Weber name, I expect the same quality and service life. The replacement of burners was straightforward and instructions well written, but did require removal of the flame control knob panel, and gas manifold.
customer_reviews.author: utpixelated

customer_reviews.title: Replacements for my grill, definitely cheaper then buying a ...
customer_reviews.text: Replacements for my grill, definitely cheaper then buying a new one and the parts in repairing the grill are simple installations.
customer_reviews.author: RayC

customer_reviews.title: Fit my 2003 Weber Genesis Silver C grill
customer_reviews.text: Just replaced all the insides of my Weber Genesis Silver C grill, which I purchased from amazon.com ten years ago. Since amazon has every order I've ever made available (and there have been a LOT of orders through the years), it was easy to know exactly what model I had and when it was purchased. I didn't have any problems with anything being too short or too long. Not sure why others had so much trouble but I thought I'd document what model grill I have so if you have the same one, you'll know it's going to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: as advertised
customer_reviews.text: exactly what I couldn't find in the stores for my older Weber grill
customer_reviews.author: Don H.

customer_reviews.title: Life extension for my weber grill. perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: perfect fit; god I like these weber grills; with a little parts effort you can keep them a long time.
customer_reviews.author: D. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Amazon is excellent with how they handle returns
customer_reviews.text: Yes, they met my expectations but I had to return 2 of the bars for replacement because of defects in the coating. Amazon is excellent with how they handle returns, so it was a minor inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Christine G

product_meta.title: Weber Porcelain-Enameled Flavorizer Bars 22.5 X 2.3 x 2.3 inches
feature_bullets: Catch drippings that smoke and sizzle, adding a smoky flavor to food
Easy To Install. Each bar is 22-1/2 inch long
Fits Spirit 300 Series (With Side-Mounted Control Panel), Spirit 700, Genesis Silver B/C, Genesis Gold B/C (2002 And Newer Models), Genesis Platinum B/C (2005 Model Year), And Weber 900 Gas Grills
Please follow images to determine if these will fit your grill
